issue.title: README.Rmd Compilation Fix

labels.name: priority:high
labels.description: High priority issue that needs immediate attention

issue.body:
## README.Rmd Compilation Fix

**Goal:**
Ensure that  compiles without errors and produces a clear, informative  for users and CRAN.

### Checklist
- [ ] Describe the current error or problem (include error messages)
- [ ] Steps to reproduce the issue
- [ ] Fix any R code chunks that fail to run
- [ ] Ensure all examples and plots render correctly
- [ ] Confirm that all referenced files/data exist and are accessible
- [ ] Run devtools::build_readme() and verify output
- [ ] Commit and push the updated README.md and any generated figures
- [ ] Update documentation in README.Rmd as needed for clarity

issue.title: Codebase Audit

labels.name: priority:high
labels.description: High priority issue that needs immediate attention

issue.body:
## Codebase Audit

**Goal:**  
Review the codebase for style, clarity, and maintainability in preparation for CRAN submission and future development.

### Checklist
- [ ] Review all exported functions for naming consistency and clarity
- [ ] Check adherence to the tidyverse style guide
- [ ] Identify duplicated code or opportunities for modularization
- [ ] List any deprecated or unused code for removal
- [ ] Review error handling and messaging
- [ ] Document any technical debt or areas for future refactoring
- [ ] Summarize findings and create follow-up issues as needed

issue.title: CRAN Preparation
issue.body:
Prepare package for CRAN submission:

- Pass R CMD check with no errors/warnings/notes
- Review DESCRIPTION and NAMESPACE
- Ensure all dependencies are properly declared
- Add NEWS.md for version history
- Document all exported functions
- Add examples for all exported functions

issue.title: Documentation Overhaul
issue.body:
Improve and expand package documentation:

- Add roxygen2 docs to all exported functions
- Create comprehensive vignettes
- Update README with clear examples
- Add package-level documentation
- Ensure all examples are runnable
- Add troubleshooting guide

issue.title: Function Documentation Review
issue.body:
Review and improve function documentation:

- Ensure all exported functions have complete roxygen2 documentation
- Add parameter descriptions and examples
- Document return values
- Add cross-references between related functions
- Include usage examples
- Document error conditions

issue.title: Test Coverage Expansion
issue.body:
Expand test coverage to ensure package reliability:

- Achieve >90% test coverage
- Add tests for edge cases
- Create test fixtures for Zoom transcript data
- Add performance benchmarks
- Implement continuous integration testing

issue.title: Test Framework Setup

labels.name: priority:high
labels.description: High priority issue that needs immediate attention

issue.body:
Set up comprehensive test framework:

- Configure testthat
- Set up test fixtures
- Create test helpers
- Add test coverage reporting
- Set up continuous integration
- Document testing procedures

issue.title: Test bug report template
issue.body:
---
name: Bug Report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: '[BUG] '
labels: ['bug']
assignees: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Load data '...'
2. Run function '....'
3. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Code Example**
```r
# Minimal reproducible example
```

**Environment:**
 - OS: [e.g. macOS 12.1]
 - R Version: [e.g. 4.1.2]
 - Package Version: [e.g. 0.1.0]

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.

issue.title: [BUG] Test template functionality
issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
Testing the bug report template functionality

**To Reproduce**
1. Go to GitHub repository
2. Click 'New issue'
3. Select 'Bug Report' template

**Expected behavior**
Template should pre-fill with the correct format

**Code Example**


**Environment:**
- OS: macOS
- R Version: 4.1.2
- Package Version: 0.1.0

**Additional context**
This is a test issue to verify template functionality
